name: Hydrating Plumping Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A visibly plumping lip gloss that delivers subtle color with glass-like shine and up to 24 hours of comforting hydration..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing, Plumping.Highlighted Ingredients:- Botanical Plumping Agent: Visibly increases lip volume by 22%..What Else You Need to Know:This tinted lip gloss imparts a delicate wash of color and comes in an array of captivating shades suitable for every skin tone. Formulated with lip-loving ingredients and visibly plumping actives, the weightless formula gives lips an instantly fuller and smoother look, without drying them out. The elegant case is adorned with gold stars and Gucci lettering, capturing the magic of starlight..Clinical Results:In a user test on 31 volunteers, after 28 days of daily use:
ingredients: Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Silica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Menthyl Lactate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Aroma/Flavor, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum/Fragrance, Methyl Nicotinate, Trihydroxystearin, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto lips, starting from the center and moving outwards..-Build up layers of color as desired..-Smooth onto bare lips for softly tinted shine..-Smooth onto lined lips for a fuller look with subtle color..-Apply on top of lipstick to add instant shine to your shade.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing but not the best plumper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss, in the color Bertha Pink, for free from Gucci and Infuenster in exchange for my honest review. When first applying, I did feel as if the glass was a bit tacky, however, it didn't end up being sticky, which I liked. The glass went on more sheer and didn't show much color. I did start to feel a slight tingle that you still get with lip plumpers, but it wasn't much and I personally enjoy my plumpers to have more of that tingle. However, it did feel moisturizing and I enjoyed how it left my lips feeling. On no makeup days, I would wear this plumper alone, with nothing else on, however, on makeup days, I would need to layer it with another lip product to provide more color. I am definitely going to continue to use this product, I'm not sure if I would repurchase though, as I do have other plumpers that I like better. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci gloss lives up to its name, delivering a delightful plumping effect and a high-shine finish that lasts. Here's the lowdown:   Pros:  Visibly plumper lips: I noticed an immediate, subtle plumping effect that lasted for hours. My lips looked smoother and fuller, without any stinging or tingling sensation. Hydrating and nourishing: This gloss feels like a luxurious lip treatment. It's packed with hyaluronic acid and black rose oil, leaving my lips feeling soft and moisturized all day. Sheer, buildable color: I love the range of flattering shades, from soft pinks to nudes and berries. The color is sheer and buildable, perfect for a natural daytime look or a bolder evening glam. High-shine finish: Get ready to shine! This gloss delivers a dazzling, crystal-like shine that makes lips look instantly kissable. Chic packaging: The star-patterned tube and gold accents feel glamorous and luxurious. It's definitely a purse-worthy accessory.  Cons:  Pricey: Be prepared to splurge, as this gloss comes with a designer price tag. Sticky factor: The gloss can be a bit sticky initially, but it dries down fairly quickly to a comfortable wear.  Overall:   Despite the slight price tag, the Gucci plumping lip gloss is a splurge-worthy treat for your lips. It delivers on its promises of plumpness, hydration, and stunning shine, making it a luxurious addition to any makeup routine.   Rating: 4.5 out of 5 stars   I hope this short review helps you decide if this lip gloss is worth the hype!

reviews.review_title: Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss- Bertha Pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a fan of almost everything about this Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss. Upon first opening, the lip gloss tube itself feels luxurious in the hands, it's plastic, but has such a smooth glass-like feel, & is somewhat weighted. The tube has a slick sort of slip, but isn't slippery, if that makes sense. The tube paired with the gold top that has small rigdes in it, makes it really fun to fiddle with every time I go to use it, also the entire thing is fingerprint resistant! I know I've said a lot about the component, but these are things I really appreciate about the product, & help make it a more luxurious experience, especially the fact that it's never smudgy looking from touching it. Now, onto the Plumping Lip Gloss itself. I really like this formula, I have tried quite a few glosses/plumping glosses & this one is lovely. The gloss is not sticky or stringy, but isn't too thin, & doesn't feel oily. It wears well & feels lightweight, almost a barely there sort of feeling, it's really lovely. The shade is a translucent, sort of milky pink tone, very much like the bunny tongue shade that was going around social media. The Plumping effects of this gloss are somewhat mild, as are most, but I love the feeling of this one, it's almost as if your lips are vibrating, it's hard to explain, it never gets to the point that it's too much, it doesn't sting, but you can definitely feel it, it's a very pleasant, enjoyable experience . The buzzing comes on slow & picks up for a bit before dissipating, then leaving you with a light minty kiss, it's just the right amount, & when you open & close your mouth, you get an extra kick of it each time. The one minor complaint I have is the rose scent of this gloss, while it is extremely tame, I would have preferred vanilla. I would recommend giving this a try, even if you aren't wild about plumping glosses,this one is just lovely & feels fantastic, it's actually a quality product, & that can be hard to find nowadays, even amongst luxury brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just because I was sent this for free in exchange for my review from Influenster doesnu2019t mean this actually sways my opinion. This is the only makeup product Iu2019ve ever given 5 stars (and Iu2019ve been doing this for almost four years)u2014but Iu2019m not sure itu2019s worth the price tag. I know I wouldnu2019t have bought it on my own, but hopefully this will be helpful to someone else trying to decide. I was sent Suzane Brown, and I think calling it a brown is a little misleading. It seems more like a mauve to me, but I could compromise and call it a milk chocolate mauve. The color is very flattering, and I think would work for a wide range of skin tones. The texture is very pleasant: itu2019s gel-like so itu2019s slippy and grippy, meaning itu2019s slick on the lips without being sticky, and it also doesnu2019t slide outside lip lines. Plus, itu2019s kind of long lasting as far as lip glosses go. Although the color kinda of fades (because itu2019s sheer to start with), the shine and hydration of the gloss stay for literal hours (Iu2019m talking like 6 hours). Since luxury brands are notorious for their fragranced cosmetics, and Iu2019m sensitive to smells, I was fully prepared to not like the scent, but itu2019s more herbal than I was expecting, and I canu2019t really smell it after having applied it. It is a tingling lip gloss, though. Itu2019s not as intense as a ducky drugstore brandu2014and if I lick my lips the sting doesnu2019t transfer. Since these plumping formulas mostly work by irritation, this doesnu2019t hurt me like most formulas, and my lips donu2019t look stung after wiping it off, either. The tingling felt more like  exceptionally tiny pinpricks that donu2019t hurt at allu2014this feels more like a minty sensation as opposed to a spicy pepper product, if that helps.

reviews.review_text: I have Bertha Pink which is a sheer pink that looks almost clear on the lips. Itu2019s a thick gloss with decent staying power but does not last the hours that it claims. The packaging is a very cheap and light plastic and doesnu2019t feel remotely luxe. It feels like little girl makeup from Claireu2019s. Overall I like it and will use it but I have others I like better for a lot less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the deep color gloss. Color isnu2019t too much but provides some decent pigment. Good cooling and tingling sensation while plumping lips too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried a plumping lip gloss before because my lips are quite full. I must say this doesnu2019t have any tingling sensation like others have mentioned when it comes to plumping lip gloss. I also liked the fact that it wasnu2019t too sticky or didnu2019t leave a white residue on my lips after long periods of wearing. I wore this gloss for a photoshoot and was highly impressed with the results. I love a clear gloss and was happy to be able to try this!

reviews.review_title: Nice but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss gives a 'your lips but better' look. The color is sheer so it gives your lips just a hint of color. The shade I have is called Suzane Brown. It's a beautiful brown shade with a slight red undertone. I don't usually like brown shades on me but I actually adore this one. If you are cool-toned and struggle to find brown shades that suit you, this shade might be your next favorite. I also think the packaging is STUNNING. It looks so elegant, especially on my vanity. However, there are a few downsides to this gloss. First, the gloss doesn't have a pleasant scent. I think it's tolerable but it smells musty, in my opinion. Secondly, though it does have a slight burning sensation, I don't notice any plumping effect. I think I would have preferred if it was just simply a hydrating gloss only.  Overall, I think it's nice but I can't say that I'd purchase this myself. If it smelled better and had longer-lasting hydration, I think it would be worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally very thin lips so I was excited to try this product. When I first applied it, it felt tingly for a brief moment and seemed to help my lips look more plump. Aside from that, I really like the gloss part of it. Itu2019s smooth, not sticky, easy to apply, not really scented, and overall a great product. Iu2019ve used it several times now and am looking forward to using it several more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Truly after using many different brands of plumping glosses this one takes the win! Love that I got a clear one, Iu2019ve put it overtop my lipsticks and it works like a charm. Minimal stickiness and high end packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought that this was just an okay gloss, however, I didnu2019t notice much of a plumping or tingly effect even though thatu2019s what itu2019s advertised as. It also has an odd smell to it. I will use it but it wonu2019t be one I regularly reach for.

reviews.review_title: beautiful for a natural look with shine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this from a few weeks now. The color is very subtle in this Bertha pink shade. It definitely has a tingling sensation when applying it. It doesn't irritate my lips which can be sensitive sometimes. I feel like it does give some hydration and feels a little thick on my lips but for lip gloss I perfer that so it lasts longer. It feels nice and smooth once applied. My lips look fuller and smoother. I would suggest this to anyone looking to add a sheer gloss with fuller lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is a pretty light red orange shade and super glossy! It definitely plumps your lips in a matter of seconds. The gloss is a bit sticky but very flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a lipgloss girl I feel you can never have too many glosses. And this is no exception, I will be purchasing myself when Iu2019m out. I got this complimentary from Influenster for testing and I love it! Itu2019s not sticky but itu2019s shiny, it feels good on my lips and looks good too. As far as the plumping goes, my lips are a pretty good size so I donu2019t notice much of a difference but thatu2019s fine.

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Intense but not unbearable! Know what to except when using this Gucci Plumping Gloss. The tingling cooling sensation is pretty intense but leaves the lips looking full and plump! Not only has it made my lips look A LOT fuller but it adds a lovely pop of color. Super easy application and great formula. I would absolutely recommend!
Love this my girlfriend looks amazing with this on it worked well to plump lips and was nice color wise beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bertha Pink is a soft pink in the component but doesn't leave much of a tint after application. the component itself is really cute, mostly clear with stars, and looks nostalgic like from when i was a teenager and buying drugstore makeup. i don't particularly like the waxy scent the gloss has, it makes me think of how old bullet lipsticks smell. ultimately, that doesn't really bother me once i've put it on, despite the occasional whiff. well, i kinda wish they added a light fragrance to mask it a bit, though other shades might smell differently. the plumping sensation is very mild and lasts thru almost an hour. it feels really mellow compared to other products i've tried. i want to point out that, on the box, it says +43% hydration after 4 weeks from an instrumental test carried on 31 people. it's only been about two weeks since i started testing this gloss before being repeatedly (and a bit aggressively) reminded into typing up a review, so i don't think i can confirm or deny this 'instrumental test.' but i will say, it doesn't seem to dehydrate my lips, so maybe that counts for something.  at first, the application feels like it's gonna be sticky. once on, it's quite smooth and slick if i roll my lips together with very little migration. the doe-foot applicator feels really nice, the shape tapers down with a bigger incline than those disposable ones i'm used to. longevity is alright thru eating and drinking, and it does seem to get a stickier after several hours. overall, i enjoy this gloss, and i'll commit to testing it through for a while longer.

Wanted to love this - it looked like such a beautiful colour.  But much to my disappointment, it smells terrible, has almost no actual colour at all when applied and doesn't taste good either.  Any drugstore product would be better than this for a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for my honest opinion. I was sent the Bertha Pink. So Gucci claims this is visibly plumping lip gloss that delivers subtle color with glass-like shine and up to 24 hours of comforting hydration. I will agree that it is a visibly plumping gloss. It goes on very smoothly. The applicator is super nice and allows for exact lining of lips. The formula is a pretty thick consistency. You can feel slightly tingly sensation for a minute or two after applying. The Bertha pink is a pretty, slightly pink neutral that is really shiny. It does look beautiful by itself or over another color. I wouldnu2019t  agree with my lips feeling hydrated for 24 hours later. Once it wears off, my lips felt the same as before putting it on. I recommend if you are looking for a nice plumping gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Gucci plumping lip gloss is really nice. I received this for free from influenster & Gucci to test and honestly, I was hesitant. I expected my lips to burn and look unnaturally swollen but I was pleasantly surprised. The color (and bottle!) is so pretty. It works but is a more subtle, natural plump. There is a bit of a tingle which is normal and manageable. On the downside- it doesnt smell great and is a bit tacky. Overall I am happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of the lucky ones who received one of the newly formulated Gucci Lip Gloss from Influenster in exchange for my review. I received the shade 118 Suzanne Brown. I really like the overall component of the lip gloss it is very luxurious, and the lip applicator helps you apply it perfectly to your lips. The formula is really smooth and sheer. It only adds a light wash of color to the lips (which is my preference when using a gloss). It goes on really easily and leaves a high gloss shine. The plumping effect isn't uncomfortable on the lips. It has a tinge of heat that helps plump the lips, and most importantly, it feels very hydrating. I would say that their description of plumping smoothing & moisturizing is very accurate. What more can I say - it's one of my new favorite glosses.  It's currently available in 6 shades that are suitable for a variety of skin tones. I personally think it's a beautiful luxurious product, and I can't wait to try more from Gucci Beauty. If you haven't tried it yet - you should.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and the color. The gloss applicator applies smoothly and evenly and the color is beautiful on. I like the slight tingling effect, but didnu2019t notice much plumping. I had a high hopes for a Gucci product but had to reapply frequently.  I have added the gloss to my rotation, but it wonu2019t replace my favorite.

reviews.review_text: I like the product itself- color, consistency, etc. But only three stars from me because of the applicator. I bought two of the same product, both applicators feel flimsy and like they will break off soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic lipgloss. So many plumping lip glosses are irritating and I canu2019t wear them for long but I didnu2019t find this irritating at all. There is a slight tingle when you first apply but it wasnu2019t painful at all and it is long lasting so you donu2019t have to constantly reapply. The light pink color was perfect and the sheen was dewy without being overly shiny. I received this sample free from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. All opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was extremely disappointed in this gloss.  It was sticky, had absolutely no tingling effect, and did not plump.  Not even a little.  Too Faced is so much better!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the clear plumping smoothing lip gloss from Gucci for my honest review from influencer and Gucci. First of all the bottle is gorgeous. It has a very faint scent Iu2019m not sure what it is but itu2019s not off putting. The texture isnu2019t overly sticky as most glosses are. It has a slight taste but doesnu2019t make the lips tingle or burn. If you lick your lips though your tongue will feel cool and slightly numb. Over all a a great product. I would but again just for the shine as I didnu2019t notice a difference in plumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out the Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss it is by far one of the best on the market. I LOVE the glossiness and it definitely plumps the lips better than any other plumping gloss I've tried. The formula is not sticky at all and applies very smoothly. I received a gorgeous coral color. It's even more beautiful than it looks! It isn't heavy in color at all and applies very light. Probably the most natural looking coral color I've ever tried. The reason I rated a star down is because of the smell. It has sort of a chemical smell to it and I just don't love that. It isn't as heavy as most plumping glosses, but the smell is faint and a bit bothersome at first. I did get use to it over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influenster. I really love this lip gloss itu2019s not too sticky and it feels and looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good lip gloss so I was excited to be gifted the Gucci plumping lip gloss! Starting with the pros: it feels smooth on the lips (not sticky at all); itu2019s moisturizing as it claims; the plumping effect feels cooling/mentholated as opposed to tingling/burning as with some lip glosses; and the shine is relatively long lasting on the lips (about 3 hours for me). For the cons: the applicator is smaller than I prefer as someone with larger lips so it takes a bit longer to apply; and this particular shade looks more like a clear gloss on me and I prefer more pigment to my glosses as I feel they liven up my face a bit more, especially on no makeup days which is typically most days for me. For me personally, most plumping glosses only give me a slight plumping effect as my lips are already on the larger side, and Iu2019d say this gloss is in line with that. What I believe sets this gloss apart from other glosses is its moisturization and longevity. That said, Iu2019m still not sure Iu2019d purchase again at the price point since it isnu2019t as pigmented as I would like. If I did, it would be another shade to see if thereu2019s a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a pretty color, but not my favorite lip gloss. This was slightly tacky and had an interesting smell. It stayed for a decent amount of time, but Iu2019m not a big fan for the sticky feeling. It did have a slight tingly sensation when initially applied. I probably wonu2019t purchase this product again.

reviews.review_title: Everlasting shine is always a plus

reviews.review_title: Beautiful gloss, but not a good smell

reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is beautiful. It was a very mild and soft tingle that didn't bother me as much as the usual plumping gloss would. What I really like about it is how smooth it made my lips feel after it wore off. Seems like a gloss+treatment in one. The only thing I absolutely hate about this gloss is the smell. I'm sure they wanted it to smell nice, and usually scented products don't bother me but something about this smell makes me gag when applying this product. It's the worst on the applicator. Not as bad after you're done applying it. That is the only reason I'm leaving a star off, otherwise the formula is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Surprised how much I love this lip gloss!!

reviews.review_text: The Gucci Plumbing Lip Gloss in Bertha Pink might appear deceiving with its pink hue in the tube, but its true magic unfolds upon application. While the initial expectation of a noticeable pink tint might not materialize, it initiates a tingling sensation, gradually fading away, leaving behind a subtle change in lip fullness-an unexpected yet intriguing effect. This gloss excels in enhancing the natural lip color, evolving it into a mesmerizing pink/red hue. Its ability to accentuate the lips without overpowering them is commendable, offering a delicate and enchanting finish. The sensory experience is delightful; the fragrance and taste strike a perfect balance, avoiding any overwhelming sensation. Meanwhile, the gloss's luxurious thickness doesn't compromise comfort, providing a rich consistency that moisturizes the lips and lasts impressively long, sparing frequent reapplications. Undoubtedly, this lip gloss has earned a special place in my beauty routine. Although its price might not suit every budget, the exceptional quality and enduring comfort justify the investment. Consider it not just a lip product but an indispensable addition to any makeup collection, offering subtle enhancements and prolonged moisture for irresistible, beautiful lips.  I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

There is a cooling sensation that lasts for about a minute as it activates moisturizing and plumping components for your lips. It is a great addition to a very natural and stunning look. Be prepared to receive a lot of compliments as it enhances your appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Not the best but not horrible...

reviews.review_text: Was excited about receiving this product but was slightly disappointed. The gloss is pretty and has a manageable plump for my lips. However for the price point, I would not repurchase the product. Aa again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited and quite surprised to have received the clear Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss complimentary from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. Upon first impression, the first thing I noticed was the adorable tube with the cute little gold stars. The clear gloss is a great selection as it can be worn alone or over your favorite lipstick. This gloss is just the right consistency and isn't too sticky. A little of this gloss goes a long way, so no need to over apply. I did notice that my lips did plump a bit after application. I do really like this lip gloss and would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It burned like crazy. Left the perimeter of my lips red and swollen. I know itu2019s supposed to plump lips but it was way too intense. Not worth the price tag either for a see through gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received shade #526 called Teresina Red. It looked more bright, coral-orange than red but once I applied it, my lips had only a slight tint of color but nothing like I thought the shade would be. It was more like clear but had a gorgeous, shiny finish. It wasn't sticky or tacky but somewhat thick to help it last. It also had a slight, menthol, tingly feeling on my lips from the added ingredients.  I love this gloss but wish it had added more color on my lips. Another shade may work better, so I'd still recommend this if you like wearing shiny lip gloss.

reviews.review_title: Glossy lip plumper with after tint.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received shade Bertha Pink! Thank you choosing me as part of Gucci Lip Gloss Campaign. Packaging is wonderful. When it comes to application, it leaves tingling and slit burning sensation on lips as in effect to plump lips.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the pain and price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: e. ![[tf_mm.png]]  Gucci Lip Gloss Thank you to @influenster and @guccibeauty for the free Gucci Gloss u00e0 Lu00e9vres Hydrating Plumping Lip Gloss. My first impression was that I really liked the color. I swatched it on my hand to begin with, and itu2019s a subtle swipe of color that goes well with my light, neutral skin tone.   When I put it on my lips, I thought it looked fine and had a nice texture but not much different than many other (and cheaper) things I already have. About 5 minutes after I applied it, my lips tingled, and not pleasantly. As time passed, they started to feel very uncomfortable, so I wiped it off about 10 minutes into wear. My lips definitely looked plumper, but Iu2019m guessing that was more due to irritation than anything else.   So because of that, I put it away and waited a few days before trying it again. No. This stuff just flat-out hurts on my lips. Don't make me use it again because it's just too tingly. It's a shame because I like the color and even the initial texture, but that tingle is awful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this plumping lip gloss, itu2019s such a pretty shade and it DOES plump your lips after like seconds of applying, Iu2019d buy it if when it runs out , I like layering it on top of lip balm bc it isnu2019t the MOST hydrating thatu2019s why Iu2019m rating it four stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using plumping gloss from other brand and loved it so when I had opportunity to receive this gloss from Influenster I was thrilled . I like everything about it especially the color but I must say I am not fond of the taste and how it feels on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This gloss is so pretty and hydrating. It does not irritate my skin, which I love. Itu2019s also super glossy and it is amazing in terms of shade.

reviews.review_text: Nice packaging. The lip gloss is very cute and easy to apply, give me a quick natural look. However, it is sticky and does not give as much plumping effect as I expected. I hope Gucci can improve the ingredients to make it more moisturizing also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The clear gloss gives the lips an enhanced pink color and plumper effect. This gloss adds a ton of moisture to the lips !  Highly recommend trying out this gloss, it comes in a few different shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I receive his product for a honest review! I do like the lipgloss I just donu2019t think itu2019s worth the price! The applicator is a little small but it helps give you more control of the product. Has a very light scent the

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My teenage daughter loves this lip gloss. It has shine with a tiny touch of color. It plumps up the lips and feels tingly . It was a perfect holiday gift . She feels so pampered whenever she puts it on. I would recommend this for anyone who wants a subtle gloss with plumping .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this gloss so much. Even though this looks like it may be dark it isnu2019t. Itu2019s a slight tint that doesnu2019t give too much or not enough. So smooth and lasts for hours without reapplying. I felt a slight tingle and first and noticed my lips puckered into a perfect pout. I would highly recommend this color. I plan on getting the clear gloss to be my daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a newbie to lip plumping cosmetics I must say for a first, it was pretty interesting. First off, I absolutely love the presentation. The tube itself looked chic from the golden top to the red and gold decorated tube. It literally won my heart off of esthetics alone. One I opened it I noticed the applicator was a bit slanted versus straight, which makes it easier to apply to your lips! The glide was smooth and the shine was EVERYTHING! I will say the tingling caught me off guard but itu2019s a plumping agent so some tingling is expected. It wasnu2019t too much. My lips are extremely sensitive so I donu2019t typically take chances with much but this was a really good experience and Iu2019d definitely would recommend this product to enhance your full lip appeal and to liven up any occasion!

reviews.review_title: Subtle Gloss, Big Impact: A Lip Gloss Convert
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Recently tried Gucci's Plumping Lip Gloss in Sadie coral and it's been a game changer for me. As someone who's not typically a lip gloss enthusiast, I was pleasantly surprised by how much I loved this product. The applicator tip is small and precise, ideal for anyone who prefers a subtler lip gloss application. It's perfect for not overwhelming the lips while still giving that glamorous gloss effect.  The tingly sensation is just right u2013 noticeable but not overpowering, adding to the plumping experience. Hours after application, my lips still felt moisturized and looked great. This is a rarity for me with lip glosses. You're definitely getting your money's worth here u2013 the quality is top-notch.  I highly recommend this Gucci lip gloss, especially if you're looking for a product with a finer applicator that doesn't compromise on quality. It's become a go-to in my daily routine, turning a non-lip gloss person like me into a fan! BBB

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice gloss. Definitely has that plumping feel. More mild version of too faced lip injections. Color is pretty sheer. I wish the applicator held more product. I have to dip in a few times.  I was sent this for free my review

reviews.review_title: I have mixed feelings on this one. Pros and cons.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my HONEST opinion! Now, where to start? I got the color u201cBertha Pinku201d which honestly looks almost clear with just the slightest hint of baby pink.  I wish I would have gotten the red/brown shade because I do like slightly more pigment with my lip products. For such a luxury product the wand SUCKS! I love me a nice thick fat applicator and this just feels cheap and flimsy unfortunately. I do however love the formula! Sheu2019s nice and thick which means it last longer on the lips ud83dudc44 if you like thicker formulas (I do) you will definitely like this. Depending on your sensitivity to u201cplumpingu201d products this does have a mild cooling sensation with this gloss, itu2019s not too much but you can definitely feel the coolness on your lips for awhile. I think the u201cplumpingu201d is from the thickness and shine of the product because I didnu2019t notice much plumping but my lips did look more juicy from the thickness and shine. For the price of the product Iu2019d like a better applicator and this shade I received isnu2019t my favorite but I would consider trying out the other more pigmented color options. Overall I think itu2019s good, not great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with this lip gloss! It enhances your natural lip color. The consistency is everything youu2019d want in a lip gloss sticky enough to last but sticky to the point where it feels gross. The smell is a bit off putting but other than that amazing

I also loved the coler very subtle yet shiny.

reviews.review_title: A must have for great lips

reviews.review_text: Great lip plumper. It is a little thicker than some Iu2019ve tried. Stays in place. Just a hint of color. Doesnu2019t tingle or make your lips feel like they are on fire. Overall great product and added to my every day routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick and was hoping for a little more plump since it burns so much but a pretty color

reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is okay. There is a little tingle in your lips but no noticeable plump like advertised. I also feel like my lips are more chapped after using. Would probably not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin lips and I can tell you there is no discernible difference whatsoever in my lips before and after putting this on. It also has a slight perfume ish scent Thereu2019s no way Iu2019d pay $42 for this!that I donu2019t particularly care for. Thereu2019s a slight tingle? But nothing much. The color isnu2019t very pronounced either. This stuff is bougie AF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss has pros and cons. The Gucci website says it contains no animal-derived ingredients. Yay! I got the Suzanne Brown shade, which looked a little scary in the tube (think chocolate pudding), but actually goes on as a nice sheer pinkish brownish shade. Iu2019m fair skinned and I think it would work well for most. The formula is a bit odd. Itu2019s smooth and not too sticky, but it doesnu2019t seem to glaze the whole lip evenly so there is some friction when you rub your lips together. The scent is what Iu2019d describe as cough syrup meets air freshener, but it doesnu2019t linger. And you can definitely feel the burn of the cayenne pepper for a few minutes. However, the look is nice and shiny and plumping. Packaging is pretty, and tube is a generous size. Iu2019d recommend that Gucci fine tune this a bit more, and then it could be a winner.

I love this lip gloss. After application, it works almost instantly. You'll feel a tingly feeling, but it isn't painful. I love how it plumped my lips. The shades available are pretty sheer, so keep that in mind if you're looking for a more pigmented color. I have it in the shade, sadie coral, and I personally love how it's sheer. It's perfect for everyday use. It has a very faint clean scent, so if you're sensitive to scents, you should be fine with this gloss. I highly, highly recommend buying this Gucci lip gloss!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product impressed me a lot. After using this, my lips are stunning and beautiful. My lips are really glowing and orange is my favorite color. I also used many lipstick products from Gucci but this is the first time I used lipgloss and it gave me a different thought about Gucci brand. I know Gucci as a fashion brand but this beauty product is one of the best lipgloss at the moment to compete with other beauty brands. The price for this product is $42 which is suitable for many people and I think it could last for couple months if you used it regularly. My lips after using this product I can feel it pumping without using any filler, it also give my lips shining too. Would recommend it to every body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product for a week to get a good feel and i tell you im blown away. It works like magic, you get a tingling feeling after application and begin to see the result almost immediately. Lips be looking so plump and pretty with a nice shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, my lips feel so soft and little plumping. I really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

I'm 40yo and she's a teen, so maybe this lip plumper is for young skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Subtle tint, big on moisture! Iu2019m hooked
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this gloss for a couple weeks now and I was pleasantly surprised at the moisture and the subtle plumping ability of this gloss! Donu2019t let the bright color scare you off - itu2019s a very pretty and very subtle tint. The tingle isnu2019t as harsh as some other brands, so at first I was afraid it wasnu2019t going to do anything (no pain no gain LOL) but I was pleased with the lip plump! I would have preferred a fruity scent over the perfumy scent for my lips, but it disappeared after a bit. The gloss isnu2019t sticky for me, like I said it moisturized well compared to many glosses that just stick on your lips and feel gooey. This goes on smooth, and isnu2019t overkill on the gooey factor. The more I used it the more I noticed a difference in my lips and they were less dry and chapped. Must be the hyaluronic acid?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

Even so, the color and shine make my lips look great. Would definitely purchase!

reviews.review_title: Nice plumping gloss for sensitive lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Thick as corn syrup, no noticeable plump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shine stays on for a long time, which is really surprising. Initially it goes on very sticky and that made me worried but it eventually melts in and adds a shine to my lips, sort of like an oil, and stops being sticky in about 20 minutes. There's some tingling for about 5 minutes while the plumping works, and you can actually see the effect. It's not a fake looking plump but it definitely adds more volume. I absolutely love the smell too. The only thing I disliked was that the color doesn't pop too much. I'm medium toned and the pink doesn't show up on my skin, so I just use it on top of other colors.

reviews.review_title: Overall amazing healthy looking lips all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: A must have in your makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so much to @guccibeauty and @influenster for this prestige brand plumping lip gloss in the color Suzzane Brown. This gloss gave me a cute pout, plumped my lips, and moisturized mild dryness. It has a very pretty mild fragrance and is super glossy smoothing finish.  However,  I was disappointed with the longevity and plumping effects. There was a mild amplification of my lip contours. I was happy that the tingling effect lasted a short duration and was not cringy burning. But the product did not last more than a few hours, without retouching for both color and pout. Nowhere near the claim of up to 8 hours of shine.  #gucci #plumplips #lipgloss #influenstervoxbox #influenster #giftedbygucci #freeproduct #producttester

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best plumping lip gloss ever! I seriously can't not how much I love this plumping gloss. There is no red irritation or spaghetti mouth with this gloss. I feel so sexy when I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Gucci lives up to their nameu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Gucci Beauty and Influenster in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are still my own. Gucci Beauty's Plumping Lip Gloss in 219 Bertha Pink is a luxurious and glamorous addition to any makeup collection. The packaging, true to the brand's style, is elegant and sophisticated, yet they added a touch of flair with the beautiful stars. The shade Bertha Pink is a delightful balance between subtle and vibrant, offering a flattering pink tint that complements various skin tones.  What sets this lip gloss apart is its plumping effect, which adds a touch of fullness to the lips without feeling overly intense, it isnu2019t a warming sensation, but almost cooling or minty. The formula is smooth, non-sticky, and provides a comfortable wear throughout the day. The gloss also boasts a pleasant scent, adding to the overall sensory experience.  While the price point reflects the high-end nature of the brand, the quality of the product justifies the investment for those seeking a combination of style, quality, and a hint of plumping magic in their lip gloss. Gucci Beauty's Plumping Lip Gloss in 219 Bertha Pink is a definite standout for those who appreciate both luxury and performance in their beauty products.

reviews.review_title: Not for meu2026 Probably not for anyone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations for this lip gloss. Between the brand, and the price point, I thought for sure this would be a 5-star product, but unfortunately that is not the case. First, the packaging looks nice initially; nothing fancy, though, just a standard lip gloss tube with gold cap, some gold stars, and gold writing. The gloss applicator is very small and very flimsy feeling; the doe foot bends a ton and feels like it will break off during application. The formula smells like wet baby powder and cheap perfume, and the taste is similar to when you spray perfume and accidentally breathe it into your mouth; it lingers for a long time, too. This gloss is thick and incredibly sticky/tacky feeling, and when you try to rub your lips together it pulls and drags. It is not at all hydrating; my lips felt dry and slightly chapped after the gloss wore off. The plumping is minor, you feel the slightest tingling after application, but itu2019s not even noticeable at all visually; no increased color or plumpness to the lips.  The pigmentation of the gloss is virtually nonexistent after application.  All that aside, my biggest problem is with whatever is in this that caused me to break out. This formula caused me to develop little whiteheads around my lips. This has never happened with any other gloss, plumping or otherwise, so I am not sure if itu2019s due to the plumping ingredients, fragrance ingredients, or something else they put in here.  In summary, this is the worst lip gloss I have ever tried. The packaging and applicator are similar, or possibly worse than, a dollar store lippie. The formula smells, tastes, and feels absolutely terrible. Itu2019s not plumping or hydrating, and it caused me to have breakouts. For a brand like Gucci, and a lip product priced at a whopping $42, I expected WAY better. I wouldnu2019t recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest review. I love the thickness of the lip gloss and the pink sheer color is perfect. It's definitely moisturizing last me all day. As far as plumping goes I don't see a difference but I will definitely keep using the lip gloss for its moisturizing and pink gloss color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First expression of this product: I have never owned a single Gucci product and the packaging alone for this lip gloss is so luxe.   I admit I was quite nervous to try this product based on previous experience with u201cplumpingu201d glosses burning but the tingle sensation of this particular plumping formula was minimal and not at all uncomfortable. The scent reminds me of something that I canu2019t quite put my finger on but is mild and pleasant. The formula is fairly tacky but I would say that the hydrating and plumping effects are totally worth the feeling. I could not believe the difference in my before and after!  I will absolutely be purchasing additional shades of this gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Gucci Plumping lipgloss was thick and not sticky. My lips felt hydrated and smooth. Most plumping glosses have a slight burn or tingle when applied and this one did not, which was great. However I did not think that my lips looks any more plump after applying. I tried the gloss in clear, and to me it was just a normal lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was literally love at first swipe!!!! This plumping gloss is super light and smooth. Almost immediately after applying, I felt the tingleu2026and the tingle was amazing! Oh and donu2019t get me started on the shine and how long it last. I recommend this plumping gloss a thousand times over and over again. Donu2019t just go get itu2026..RUN to get it! Thank you Gucci and Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Gucci in exchange for my honest review:  Gucci's Plumping Lip Gloss is a pocket-sized charm! Effortlessly portable, it's a savior on hectic days. The applicator ensures a smooth, mess-free glide, leavingtt lips plump and luscious. My lips did get a tingling sensation after my first application but I could tell it was try to work/activate. Whether rushing or relaxing, this gloss adds instant chicness in a single swipe! This is just what I needed and it lasted the entire evening at my Christmas party!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a complimentary sample for testing; this clear lip gloss delivers a natural, non-sticky shine perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci is the very best!! First off the color is chefs kiss! The gloss really makes my lips look hydrated and super pretty! Long lasting and not over powering in color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, I was surprised to receive this gloss and opened it up to try it right away.   It is a very pretty gloss.  It's thick but not particularly sticky.  I don't notice any plumping effects.  The scent, however,  is reminiscent of my mom's perfume in the 1970's with the hint of Vantage 100s as a base note. Luckily,  the scent dissipates quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the plumping isn't as bad as it can be I can stand it on my lips it's not very opaque on darker lips so you will need a liner I love the size in packaging this lip gloss stays in my bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster review here! I just want to first say this freaking gloss is gorgeous. The packaging is so cute but luxurious at the same time. They sent me the clear gloss, which for me is perfect as I don't wear makeup and I don't like colored products on my face. The second thing I want to say is that the plumping factor of this gloss is so nice, its not stingy, and it doesn't burn. It tingles, but gives you the same effect as a nice plumped lip without the uncomfortable feeling that some plumping glosses give. The most important thing, its not sticky, its very lightweight, and its a very thin gloss. All those things tied together make for the perfect plumping gloss. If you haven't got this yet, you need this in your beauty bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A nice gloss makes lips look nice and glossy Also my lips feel smooth but I wish I got a different color though but besides that itu2019s good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for some hydrating and Glossy look. Its a great outlook for a simple makeup look. I usually top it off with a matte or simple lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know maybe I'm being more of a harsh critic because I paid for this myself and did not receive it to review, but I was quite disappointed with this product. I was expecting sort of a luxury type experience, and it was definitely not. First off, the packaging itself looked cheap to me. I thought the containers were a solid color, matching the corresponding shade, no it's just cheap lightweight clear plastic. Not heavy, not expensive feeling. The applicator/doe foot is very small, reminded me of little one you use as a tester at the store. The formula was just a clear gloss at best. I ordered the Fuschia shade, no pigment, no plumping. It had a weird unpleasant taste/scent, kind of cough syrupy. All in all, not pleased with this purchase. Will be returning/exchanging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have never had anything Gucci. I also have never EVER had lip plumping gloss. I received this from Influenster for free to give my honest review. I AM IN LOVE!!! The packaging alone felt so luxurious. When I put it on my lips I was a little scared it was going to burn super bad. Once again my mind was blown. Went on so smooth. Did have a little tingling but nothing horrible. Had a perfect tint to my lips that were so chapped before I put on. Stayed on for so long. I absolutely love this plumping gloss and can't wait to buy from Sephora once it launches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obssesed!! My fiancu00e9e managed to get his hands on this early and it was an amazing Christmas gift. It applies light weight and gives you the perfect amount of pigment. It lasts a surprisingly long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free to test on #influencer it was my first product tester but anyway this product is absolutely mesmerizing! the shine is blinding in such a beautiful way, it is a tad sticky but the shine and plump are so worth it! it has a slight tingling sensation for a plump that is super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Gucci Plumping Lip Gloss in Bertha Pink from Influenster in a VoxBox.  It is very glossy, I can feel a slight tingling that is hardly noticeable but feels pleasant  and has a nice scent that is not overpowering.  However, I don't notice any plumping. I have it on with a dab of  Bare Minerals Lip Gloss in Mink to add a little color.  I really like this lip gloss and would recommend it, especially if you don't like plumping lip gloss that stings your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Gucciu2019s Plumping Lip Gloss, and it's become a staple in my makeup routine. The formula is not only lusciously smooth but also delivers on its promise to plump up my lips. The gloss has a subtle tingling sensation upon application, which lets me know it's working its plumping magic. What I love most is that it doesn't feel overly sticky like some other plumping glosses I've tried. Instead, it gives a comfortable, hydratin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is marketed to be plumping, smoothing, moisturizing and sheer and I find that most of what it claims to be, does hold true.   This gloss is definitely sheer, with a thinner gel-like consistency (Think Buxom, but a little less thick/plush) It is slightly tacky, but nothing that gives that undesirable goopy, u201cstringyu201d effect on the lips. There is a definite tingle but itu2019s not a painful one by any means, although I still wouldnu2019t recommend wearing this if itu2019s freezing temperatures outside. It smooths out the lines on my lips nicely, and definitely gives a plumping effect to the lips. I cannot speak much on wear time as I admittedly wipe off all my lip products before eating or drinking anything ud83eudee2  The biggest con to this gloss (for me) is the slightly perfume-y after taste (One of the things that often deters me from luxury-brand lip products) Itu2019s not as prominent as some other products I have tried, but itu2019s very much there (Bear in mind I am extremely sensitive to fragrance/aroma in lip products)  Overall, Iu2019m very happy and grateful to have received this as a complimentary product from Influenster & Gucci and will continue to use it. The packaging is beautiful as all Gucci products are, but  I would not run out and purchase this with my own money; Itu2019s a very standard plumping gloss.
